name: Chrono Age
description:
IPCA Game Jam 2017 Entry

Chrono Age is an action RPG that tells the story of a wizard who is capable of going through time. Chronos uses his power to change his appearance and skills to solve puzzles.

(Word from the devs - Our idea was very ambitious, but due to our inexperience in the game engine, we couldn't implement all of the mechanics we wanted)

Controls:
ARROWS move
Q attack with spell
1/2/3 change appearance(1-adult, 2-old, 3-child)
W/S zoom
D/F rotate camera
Z return camera to the original position
